title: Technic Elepower Compatibility
name: technic_elepower_compat
short_description: Technic machines can make items from Elepower. Elepower machines can make items from Technic, and will soon be able to use Technic electricity.
long_description: A collaboration project with Bob64 that adds recipes for Technic machines to make some items from Elepower. Also allows Elepower machines to make some items from Technic. Electric Compatibility will later be added to enable Elepower machines to use electricity from Technic.
